# Did you hear in the news about that graveyard selling bodies?

**Artist:** Irregular Galaxy Doods  
**Source:** https://www.instagram.com/p/DMYYCAZoUYO/  
**Website:** https://www.instagram.com/ig_doods/  
**Date:** July 21, 2025  
**Comment:** I'm not even sorry ☺️ send this to a friend and tell me your worst joke in the comments ✨  
**Tags:** #webtoon #punny #puns

## Generated Files

### Video (MP4)
```bash
../../pic2vid.sh -s ctime -d 2 2 2 3 \
  -m title="Did you hear in the news about that graveyard selling bodies?" \
  -m artist="Irregular Galaxy Doods" \
  -m date="2025-07-21" \
  -m comment="I'm not even sorry ☺️ send this to a friend and tell me your worst joke in the comments ✨" \
  -o graveyard.mp4 \
  *.jpg
```

**Output:** [graveyard.mp4](graveyard.mp4) - 64KB, 9 seconds

### Animated GIF
```bash
../../pic2vid.sh -f gif -s ctime -d 2 2 2 3 \
  -o graveyard.gif \
  *.jpg
```

**Output:** [graveyard.gif](graveyard.gif) - 242KB, 9 seconds

*Note: GIF format does not support embedded metadata tags.*

## Configuration

- **Sorting:** By creation time (oldest first)
- **Duration:** 2s, 2s, 2s, 3s per frame
- **Total Duration:** 9 seconds
- **Format:** 576x720 (adaptive to largest image)
